text: The women's K-4 500 metres competition at the 2018 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships in Montemor-o-Velho took place at the Centro de Alto Rendimento de Montemor-o-Velho. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | rowspan=2|Saturday 25 August 2018 || 16:41 || Heats |- | 18:06 || Semifinal |- | style=background:lemonchiffon|Sunday 26 August 2018 || style=background:lemonchiffon| 13:17 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final |} All times are Western European Summer Time (UTC+1) ==Results== ===Heats=== The fastest three boats in each heat advanced directly to the final. The next four fastest boats in each heat, plus the fastest remaining boat advanced to the semifinal. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Kayakers !Country !Time !Notes
